# Cruise data from flight test data.
# descent at 180 KTAS and 55% power


# 75% power, from RV-8 flt test data
# Cruise perf for 75% power
# 8 USG or 45 min Reserve Fuel
# Wheel pants ON
# Range   Alt
#  (nm)  (ft)
475.4     0
477.5   500
477.9  1000
478.2  1500
478.6  2000
479.5  2500

483.9  5500
484.3  6000
484.6  6500
485.0  7000
485.4  7500
485.7  8000
485.4  8500
